briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Ingenol Mebutate Gel for Actinic Keratosis Applied on Large Area on Face, Scalp or Chest
officialTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Ingenol Mebutate Gel in Field Treatment of Actinic Keratosis on Full Face, Balding Scalp or Approximately 250 cm2 on the Chest
summary: The objective of the trial is to investigate efficacy and safety of ingenol mebutate gel for actinic keratosis applied to large treatment areas once daily for three consecutive days on face, scalp or chest.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Complete Resolution of Actinic Keratosis (AK)
